title: Alex Ovechkin scores 50 goals for the ninth time, tying Wayne Gretzky and Mike Bossy for the most ever - Russian Machine Never Breaks
description: Alex Ovechkin scored his 49th goal of the season in the second period and would not be denied number 50 against the Vegas Golden Knights. After shanking a breakaway late in the third period, Ovechkin took a pass from Dmitry...
content: After shanking a breakaway late in the third period, Ovechkin took a pass from Dmitry Orlov, wound up to the moon, and blasted one of the hardest shots of his career past Logan Thompson for the miles… [+3933 chars]
